content:
You can attach a few files for test decryption by packing them into an archive with zip, rar, tar, 7zip, 7z, tar.gz extensions of no more than 10 megabytes using the attach button directly in the chat.

If your archive weighs more than 10 megabytes, please use our file sharing service.
http://lockbitfss2w7co3ij6am6wox4xcurtgwukunx3yubcoe5cbxiqakxqd.onion
http://lockbitfsvf75glg226he5inkfgtuoakt4vgfhd7nfgghx5kwz5zo3ad.onion
http://lockbitfskq2fxclyfrop5yizyxpzu65w7pphsgthawcyb4gd27x62id.onion
For security reasons we do not click on other links you send in chat.
Please wait for a reply, sometimes it takes several hours due to possible time zone differences.

Hello,
we received your message and would like to discuss the matter.
Please send us a sample of the encrypted data to confirm your ability to decrypt it. Let us know the conditions for decryption, including the timeframe.
We look forward to your response
My boss will send you your files within a few hours.
If you don't pay, we will make your stolen data publicly available

We would like to clarify that we are a small company and we cannot afford the requested amount of 1 BTC. This sum would force us to close our business and file for bankruptcy.
However we are willing to pay 0.16 BTC. We hope you will consider our offer.
You should try naming your amount again.
